PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2013-05692013-05-23,  ,  ,  ,  HRSDC,  CEIC,  , 
ActEmployment Insurance Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Employment Insurance Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the EMPLOYMENT INSURANCE REGULATIONS in order to enable implementation of the parents of critically ill children benefit by (1) providing precision to amendments to the Employment Insurance Act concerning eligibility for the new Employment Insurance benefit for parents of critically ill children; and (2) maintaining consistency with existing provisions in the Employment Insurance Act and the Employment Insurance Regulations related to similar Employment Insurance special benefits.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2013-0102 Publication Date: 2013-06-05
AttachmentsAttachment
